StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_ONEO.cerSelec.onBoardProgramResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN SELECT CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM MALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM FEMALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM MALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM PROGRAM FEMALE NON-SELECTED' FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MARINE M ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 GROUP BY CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION END
